data.name: Crusade of Deitra

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Processore Intel® Core™ i5-11500HE (12 MB di cache, fino a 4,50 GHz)
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD A10-9620P RADEON R5
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

The violation of the rights provided therein may therefore result in the application of the criminal or administrative sanctions provided for by art. 171, 171-bis, 171-ter, 174-bis and 174-ter of the law of 22 April 1941, n. 633, in addition to the civil penalties provided for by the Italian civil code.
